cds.java.project.grid

Class SimpleGrid<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid<T>

  • public class SimpleGrid<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a SimpleGrid template structure under the form of a class; This was the basic form for the grid that I intended to use, but I decided to stick with a simpler implementation (left this here as it is a way better way of working with a grid and, I might use it in a future rework); it wraps a template matrix that must play the role of the place in which elves reside and do their work by moving and creating gifts
    Since:
    2018-12-31
    Author:
    Buse-Dragomir Alexandru

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private T[][] gridMatrix
      Template underlying matrix that represents the actual grid
      private int height
      The height of the grid matrix
      private int length
      The length of the grid matrix

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleGrid(int orderOfMatrix)
      Constructor gets as a parameter the order of the matrix; this is the one that will be used in the problem, as all matrices are square ones with of a given order; it sets the length and height to be both equal to the order of the matrix and a new background matrix structure is created
      SimpleGrid(int length, int height)
      Constructor gets as a parameter the length and height dimensions of the matrix; it sets the length and height accordingly and creates the matrix structure

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void fillMatrixWithValue(T defaultValue)
      Private method that fills the matrix with a default value given as a parameter; it makes use of an enhanced for loop and a method from the Arrays class that resides in the java.util package
      T[][] getGridMatrix()
      Getter method for the underlying matrix structure
      int getHeight()
      Getter method for the matrix height
      int getLength()
      Getter method for the matrix length
      void setGridMatrix(T[][] gridMatrix)
      Setter method for the underlying matrix structure
      void setHeight(int height)
      Setter method for the matrix height
      void setLength(int length)
      Setter method for the matrix length
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString() method from the Object class has been overridden in order for it to return the length and height of the generic grid

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
